item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 5, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump's Tariffs Wipe Out over $6T on Wall Street in Epic Two-Day Rout (119 points | 65 comments)
2. The blissful Zen of a good side project (151 points | 39 comments)
3. Understanding Machine Learning: From Theory to Algorithms (225 points | 34 comments)
4. The End of Sierra as We Knew It, Part 1: The Acquisition (158 points | 54 comments)
5. Coolify: Open-source and self-hostable Heroku / Netlify / Vercel alternative (81 points | 35 comments)
6. An interactive-speed Linux computer made of only 3 8-pin chips (166 points | 60 comments)
7. Show HN: uWrap.js – A faster and more accurate text wrapping util in < 2KB (30 points | 5 comments)
8. Show HN: Clawtype v2.1 – a one-hand chorded USB keyboard and mouse [video] (20 points | 3 comments)
9. The Tcl Programming Language: A Comprehensive Guide (2nd Edition) (70 points | 40 comments)
10. The 'Judicial Black Hole' of El Salvador's Prisons Is a Warning for Americans (89 points | 19 comments)
11. Why Does Claude Speak Byzantine Music Notation? (65 points | 32 comments)
12. Kerosene did not save the sperm whale (2024) (150 points | 49 comments)
13. An image of an archeologist adventurer who wears a hat and uses a bullwhip (1406 points | 835 comments)

15. Scaling Up Reinforcement Learning for Traffic Smoothing (18 points | 7 comments)

18. Microsoft’s original source code (522 points | 282 comments)
19. Google announces Sec-Gemini v1 a new experimental cybersecurity model (111 points | 23 comments)
20. New antibiotic that kills drug-resistant bacteria found in technician's garden (353 points | 250 comments)
21. Thunder Compute (YC S24) is hiring a GPU systems engineer ( | hide)
22. Ask HN: Are Squarespace and Wix sites worth it? (18 points | 23 comments)
23. Study finds solo music listening boosts social well-being (232 points | 97 comments)
24. Cashless society drives drop in children swallowing coins, researchers say (6 points | 12 comments)
25. Gumroad’s source is available (430 points | 188 comments)
26. Nvidia adds native Python support to CUDA (391 points | 156 comments)
27. Curl-impersonate: Special build of curl that can impersonate the major browsers (503 points | 140 comments)
28. DeepSeek: Inference-Time Scaling for Generalist Reward Modeling (121 points | 23 comments)
29. Build an 8-bit computer from scratch (2016) (379 points | 62 comments)
30. What satellite images reveal about Myanmar's quake [video] (40 points | 1 comment)
